description:
'os-interface' resource name needs to be fixed in V3 code base to work for V2.1 API.

V2 and V3 diff for this resource name is below-

V2 - '/servers/os-interface'
V3 - '/servers/os-attach-interfaces'

V3 resource name needs to be changed to work that for V2.1.

This needs to be fixed to make V2.1 backward compatible with V2 APIs
title: 'os-interface' resource name is wrong for Nova V2.1

comments.content:
'os-interface' resource name needs to be fixed in V3 code base to work for V2.1 API.

V2 and V3 diff for this resource name is below-

V2 - '/servers/os-interface' 
V3 - '/servers/os-attach-interfaces'

V3 resource name needs to be changed to work that for V2.1
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ghanshyammann

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/120692
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=f7ef2b09a195f853cecaa28db710d643a8e30f78
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit f7ef2b09a195f853cecaa28db710d643a8e30f78
Author: Ghanshyam <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Sep 11 14:56:36 2014 +0900

    Fix 'os-interface' resource name for Nova V2.1
    
    V2 and V3 diff for this resource name is below-
    V2 - '/servers/os-interface'
    V3 - '/servers/os-attach-interfaces'
    
    V3 resource name needs to be changed to work that for V2.1
    
    Change-Id: I37bd7cee7e8879b01a8aee739d74c2dd6e033dc4
    Closes-Bug: #1368035
